languages.text: "Ожидание может занять вечность. И, в конце концов, на подобной планете война может идти не против материального противника". {n}Эдельтрад взмахивает рукой.{/n} "Полки и армии не всегда решают затруднения, подобные описанным. Вряд ли, {name}, вам это известно".

traits.locale_text: "Ожидание может занять вечность. И, в конце-концов, на подобной планете война может идти не против материального противника". {n}Эдельтрад взмахивает рукой.{/n} "Полки и армии не всегда решают затруднения, подобные описанным. Вряд ли, {name}, вам это известно".

languages.text: "The wait alone might take an eternity. Not to mention that such a planet might present an opposing force that is not material in nature." {n}Edelthrad waves his hand.{/n} "Regiments and armies are not always the solution to predicaments such as the one described. It would appear you do not know that, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Ожидание может занять вечность. И, в конце концов, на подобной планете война может идти не против материального противника". {n}Эдельтрад взмахивает рукой.{/n} "Полки и армии не всегда решают затруднения, подобные описанным. Вряд ли, {name}, вам это известно".

traits.locale_text: "The wait alone might take an eternity. Not to mention that such a planet might present an opposing force that is not material." {n}Edelthrad waves his hand.{/n} "Regiments and armies are not always the solution to predicaments such as the one described. I doubt you are aware of that fact, {name}."

"The wait alone might take an eternity. Not to mention that such a planet might present an opposing force that is not material." {n}Edelthrad waves his hand.{/n} "Regiments and armies are not always the solution to predicaments such as the one described. I doubt you are aware of that fact, {name}."

"The wait alone might take an eternity. Not to mention that such a planet might present an opposing force that is not material in nature." {n}Edelthrad waves his hand.{/n} "Regiments and armies are not always the solution to predicaments such as the one described. It would appear you do not know that, {name}."

"The wait alone might take an eternity. Not to mention that such a planet might present an opposing force that is not material in nature." {n}Edelthrad waves his hand.{/n} "Regiments and armies are not always the solution to predicaments such as the one described. It would appear you do not know that, {name}."

"The wait alone might take an eternity. Not to mention that such a planet might present an opposing force that is not material in nature." {n}Edelthrad waves his hand.{/n} "Regiments and armies are not always the solution to predicaments such as the one described. It would appear you do not know that, {name}."

languages.text: “光是等待，恐怕就足够等上一辈子了。更不用提，这样的行星很可能会出现某种并非实体的反抗力量。”{n}艾德萨德挥了挥手。{/n}“并非所有军团与士兵都清楚该如何对付这样的敌人。看来，你并不了解这一点，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "The wait alone might take an eternity. Not to mention that such a planet might present an opposing force that is not material in nature." {n}Edelthrad waves his hand.{/n} "Regiments and armies are not always the solution to predicaments such as the one described. It would appear you do not know that, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “光是等待，恐怕就足够等上一辈子了。更不用提，这样的行星很可能会出现某种并非实体的反抗力量。”{n}艾德萨德挥了挥手。{/n}“并非所有军团与士兵都清楚该如何对付这样的敌人。看来，你并不了解这一点，{name}。”

languages.text: «La misma espera ya tardaría una eternidad. Y eso por no mencionar que un planeta así podría presentar enemigos de naturaleza menos material». {n}Edelthrad gesticula.{/n} «Los regimientos y ejércitos no siempre sirven para resolver situaciones como la descrita. Parece que aún no lo sabe, {name}».
languages.original_text: "The wait alone might take an eternity. Not to mention that such a planet might present an opposing force that is not material in nature." {n}Edelthrad waves his hand.{/n} "Regiments and armies are not always the solution to predicaments such as the one described. It would appear you do not know that, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «La misma espera ya tardaría una eternidad. Y eso por no mencionar que un planeta así podría presentar enemigos de naturaleza menos material». {n}Edelthrad gesticula.{/n} «Los regimientos y ejércitos no siempre sirven para resolver situaciones como la descrita. Parece que aún no lo sabe, {name}».

languages.text: 「待つだけでは永遠に時間がかかるかもしれません。言うまでもないが、そんな惑星は物質ではない反力を示す可能性があります」{n}エデルスラドが手を振る。{/n}「連隊や軍隊が、ここで述べたような苦境を常に解決できるとは限りません。あなたはそれを知らないようですね、{name}」
languages.original_text: "The wait alone might take an eternity. Not to mention that such a planet might present an opposing force that is not material in nature." {n}Edelthrad waves his hand.{/n} "Regiments and armies are not always the solution to predicaments such as the one described. It would appear you do not know that, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「待つだけでは永遠に時間がかかるかもしれない。言うまでもなく、そんな惑星は物質ではない反力を示す可能性がある」{n}エデルスラドが手を振る。{/n}「連隊や軍隊が、ここで述べたような苦境を常に解決できるとは限りません。あなたはそれを知らないようですね、{name}」
「待つだけでは永遠に時間がかかるかもしれません。言うまでもないが、そんな惑星は物質ではない反力を示す可能性があります」{n}エデルスラドが手を振る。{/n}「連隊や軍隊が、ここで述べたような苦境を常に解決できるとは限りません。あなたはそれを知らないようですね、{name}」

languages.text: « Cela pourrait prendre une éternité à mettre en place, sans compter qu'une telle planète pourrait présenter une force d'opposition qui ne soit pas d'ordre matériel. L'armée et les troupes d'élite ne sont pas toujours la solution dans une situation comme celle-ci, {n}déclare Edelthrad en agitant la main.{/n} De toute évidence, vous l'ignorez, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "The wait alone might take an eternity. Not to mention that such a planet might present an opposing force that is not material in nature." {n}Edelthrad waves his hand.{/n} "Regiments and armies are not always the solution to predicaments such as the one described. It would appear you do not know that, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Cela pourrait prendre une éternité à mettre en place, sans compter qu'une telle planète pourrait présenter une force d'opposition qui ne soit pas d'ordre matériel. L'armée et les troupes d'élite ne sont pas toujours la solution dans une situation comme celle-ci, {n}déclare Edelthrad en agitant la main.{/n} De toute évidence, vous l'ignorez, {name}. »

languages.text: "Schon das Warten alleine könnte ewig dauern. Mal ganz abgesehen davon, dass so ein Planet gegnerische Kräfte aufbieten könnte, die nicht materieller Natur sind." {n}Edelthrad winkt ab.{/n} "Regimenter und Armeen sind nicht immer die Lösung für Probleme wie das beschriebene. Aber anscheinend wisst Ihr das nicht, {name}."
languages.original_text: "The wait alone might take an eternity. Not to mention that such a planet might present an opposing force that is not material in nature." {n}Edelthrad waves his hand.{/n} "Regiments and armies are not always the solution to predicaments such as the one described. It would appear you do not know that, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Schon das Warten alleine könnte ewig dauern. Mal ganz abgesehen davon, dass so ein Planet gegnerische Kräfte aufbieten könnte, die nicht materieller Natur sind." {n}Edelthrad winkt ab.{/n} "Regimenter und Armeen sind nicht immer die Lösung für Probleme wie das beschriebene. Aber anscheinend wisst Ihr das nicht, {name}."

languages.text: "Sadece beklemesi bile bir ömür sürebilir. Böyle bir gezegenin maddi olmayan bir karşıt güç sergileyebileceğinden bahsetmiyorum bile." {n}Edelthrad elini sallıyor.{/n} "Alaylar ve ordular, bu gibi açmazlar için her zaman çözüm değildir. Anlaşılan bundan bihabersin {name}."
languages.original_text: "The wait alone might take an eternity. Not to mention that such a planet might present an opposing force that is not material in nature." {n}Edelthrad waves his hand.{/n} "Regiments and armies are not always the solution to predicaments such as the one described. It would appear you do not know that, {name}."
